title: My account got hacked
body:
so my account got hacked and the person who hacked it refunded my skins and changed my name
does this go under chargebacks in the support or where does it go?

replies.body:
Submit an Account Recovery ticket through support. Once ownership is verified and the account is secure, player support should be able to restore any content changes that were made while the account was compromised.

It's worth noting that many compromised accounts will later be hit in a 3rd party (cheating) ban wave (because the intruders use them), so if that happens at any point, just ticket support again and they'll be able to get it sorted for you. Having the owner verification and the paper trail from this should make that process easier if it comes up.
